subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Diego Maradona was offered a chance to coach Argentina’s national team but declined to say whether he accepted. Maradona and Carlos Bilardo were asked to lead the national team by Julio Grondona, head of the country’s soccer association. Maradona would be the coach and Bilardo the general director. “There are some things to resolve,” Maradona said.
